title: Textile, 1920s
description: Polychrome block print on coarse natural linen. Two parallel serpentine branches with elaborate and fantastic blossoms in red, pink, purple, blue with large curling fantastic leaves. After the manner of an 18th century painted cotton. Condition: soiled.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920s.
1920s. Medium: linen
Technique: block printed. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-20.
